title: Frequency and period - period for block mass 2m0

content.question: A block of mass <math alttext="m sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>m</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math> hangs from a vertical spring attached to the ceiling. The spring is stretched a distance <math alttext="D" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>D</mi></math> from its relaxed length, and the block is at rest. The block is then replaced with a larger block of mass <math alttext="2 m sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>m</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math>. The larger block is set to oscillate vertically in simple harmonic motion. What is the period of its oscillation?

choices.label: <math alttext="2 pi times the square root of the fraction D over 2 g" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi><msqrt><mfrac><mi>D</mi><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>g</mi></mrow></mfrac></msqrt></math>
<math alttext="2 pi times the square root of the fraction D over g" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi><msqrt><mfrac><mi>D</mi><mi>g</mi></mfrac></msqrt></math>

<math alttext="2 pi times the square root of the fraction 2 D over g" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi><msqrt><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>D</mi></mrow><mi>g</mi></mfrac></msqrt></math>

<math alttext="2 pi times the square root of the fraction 4 D over g" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi><msqrt><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>D</mi></mrow><mi>g</mi></mfrac></msqrt></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="2 pi times the square root of the fraction 2 D over g" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi><msqrt><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>D</mi></mrow><mi>g</mi></mfrac></msqrt></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
